sentences.en: After being touched up, the essay reads more smoothly.
sentences.cn: 稿子经过这样一改,念起来就顺口多了.

sentences.en: He started the car, which hummed smoothly.
sentences.cn: 他发动了汽车，车发出平稳的嗡嗡声。

sentences.en: It is smoothly contoured to look like a racing car.
sentences.cn: 这辆车外形设计流畅，看起来像赛车。

sentences.en: Make sure that you execute all movements smoothly and without jerking.
sentences.cn: 一定要保证所有动作自然流畅，不要一顿一顿的。

sentences.en: She says everything is going smoothly.
Soon they found their scientific reseaches were not progressing smoothly.
sentences.cn: 不久他们发现他们的科学研究工作进展得并不顺利.

sentences.en: The different components all have to interface smoothly.
sentences.cn: 不同的部件都必须能顺利接合。

sentences.en: The operation was moving along smoothly.
The replumbing and rewiring of the flat ran very smoothly.
sentences.cn: 公寓里管道和电线的更换工作都进展得非常顺利。

sentences.en: The system was clearly not functioning smoothly or transparently.
sentences.cn: 该系统显然运行并不顺畅，也不明晰。

sentences.en: The workmen are very cooperative, so the work goes on smoothly.
sentences.cn: 工人们十分合作, 所以工作进展顺利.

sentences.en: Traffic is now flowing smoothly again.
Under his leadership, many knotty problems were smoothly solved.
sentences.cn: 在他的领导下, 许多伤脑筋的问题都迎刃而解.
